PAD.synopsis: Players can talk to Stonemason Kith to obtain some info on the city. The following VB is a reaction to the knowledge acquired in that dialog. For specifics, see UND_DuergarRebelMason_01.This will be anchored on the character who left the dialog but this is mostly reacting to an info dump, so all characters can be opinionated.

PAD_0.speaker: Player
PAD_0.text: Incredible. Every rock, every jewel tells a story.

PAD_1.speaker: Player
PAD_1.text: The most interesting secrets are alway lurking just under the surface.
